book.Author: Jules Verne
book.Title: A Journey to the Center of the Earth
book.Description: Famous adventure tale that practically launched the genre in 1864

book.Author: H.G. Wells
book.Title: The War of the Worlds
book.Description: The Martians come to England. A famous example of invansion literature from 1898

book.Author: Aldous Huxley
book.Title: Brave New World
book.Description: Set in 2540, this novel imagines a radically different future. So good, it's taught in schools.

book.Author: Edwin Balmer & Philip Wylie
book.Title: When Worlds Collide
book.Description: Earth must be evacuated because another planet is on a collision course
